features: MADE TO LAST with a manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
TAKE ME FOR A SPIN - MULTI-DIRECTIONAL 4-WHEEL SPINNERS allow for smooth effortless 360° free-weight maneuvering.
LIGHTWEIGHT SO KEEP PACKING. ABS construction makes this luggage one of the lightest in the market.

FLEXIBLE FEATURES FOR ALL TYPES OF TRAVEL Featuring a top and side grab handle for easy maneuvering and four molded side feet that allow luggage to stand upright on its side. Equipped with a sturdy and user-friendly push-button retractable trolley handle.
BASH AND BUMP READY. DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT luggage that is made of a shock resistant ABS exterior with reinforced protective molded corner guards that absorb shock for maximum impact resistance.

IT’S WHAT’S ON THE INSIDE THAT COUNTS. SUPERIOR INTERIOR ORGANIZATION with a main compartment made of tear-resistant lining and features double-sided packing, a zippered organization pocket, and garment restraint straps to hold your clothes in place.
body.description: Designed for the modern traveler on the go, this 20-inch lightweight durable hardside carry-on suitcase from Kenneth Cole Reaction’s “Out Of Bounds” collection is sure to make a statement. This carry-on travel suitcase is packed with features, including a spacious fully lined interior, molded corner guard reinforcements for maximum impact resistance, garment restraints to keep your contents in place, and molded side feet that allow the suitcase to stand upright on its side. This luggage is made of a lightweight and very durable hard ABS that is scratch resistant and has a high impact resistance. Carry-on suitcase feature multi-directional, 4-wheel spinners that also allow for smooth, 360-degree rotation over any terrain, allowing you to get where you’re going faster. Exterior of luggage features a top and side grab handle for easy lifting. The locking, retractable trolley handle extends to be 41 inches tall and has a convenient push button mechanism. Main compartment zipper pullers feature a small loop that can fit a TSA lock or pad lock for extra security. 20" carry-on luggage is designed to meet most U.S based & international airline carry-on luggage size requirements and designed to fit into most overhead bins. ★ Backed by a manufacturer 10-year limited guarantee against craftsmanship and manufacturer defects. ★ Dimensions Include Handles & Wheels. ★ [20" Carry-on Dimensions] 21.75” H x 14.5” W x 8.5” D. ★ [20" Internal Packing Dimensions] 20” H x 13.5” W x 7.5” D. ★ [20” Luggage Weight] 5.65 lbs. ★ The perfect lightweight and dependable hard side carry on luggage for travelers whom value both style and function. ★

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kenneth Cole Reaction A combination of modern, functional, and versatile luggage, footwear, clothing, and accessories that make daily dressing effortless. This socially conscious brand also addresses not just what people stand in, but what they stand for.

Out of Bounds Luggage Collection Pack your essentials for an overnight trip or a weekend getaway inside this durable hardside 4-wheel spinner 20", 24", and 28" suitcase from Kenneth Cole Reaction’s “Out of Bounds” luggage collection. Loaded with amazing features including a spacious fully lined interior, molded corner guard reinforcements for maximum impact resistance, and a large U-shaped zipper pocket that allows for double-sided packing. Also features multi-directional 4-wheel spinner wheels that allow for smooth 360-degree rotation over any rough surface. The 20" carry-on meets almost all U.S.-based airline carry-on size requirements and fits into most airline overhead bin compartments. Designed to be considered a true carry-on. The perfect lightweight and dependable hardside suitcase for travelers and professionals who value both style and function.

Functional Features Multi-Directional 4-Wheel Spinners Allow for smooth movement in any direction, and over any rough surface, for complete mobility free-weight rolling, relieving any pressure from your arms while on the move. Retractable Push-Button Handle Sturdy locking retractable push-button telescopic trolley handle conductive for simple, one-handed use.Handle made of a durable aluminum for long-lasting use.Collapses down in one smooth move for compact storage when not in use. Durable & Lightweight Molded corner guard reinforcements for maximum impact resistance.Protective hardshell case and long-lasting zippers provide peace of mind for the traveler, letting you know your belongings will make it to your destination looking as great as they did when they departed.Lightweight construction helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions and avoid unneeded airport fees

Spacious Interior Compartment Dimensions 20” Carry-On Dimensions Overall: 21.75” H x 14” W x 8.5” D Interior: 20" H x 13.5" W x 7.5" D 24” Checked-Size Dimensions Overall: 26” H x 18.5” W x 10.25” D Interior: 24" H x 16.5" W x 8.5" D 28” Checked-Size Dimensions Overall: 29.5” H x 20.5” W x 11.75” D Interior: 28" H x 19.5" W x 9.5" D

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and good quality for its price range
reviews.reviewText: I already own two carry on sized versions of this suitcase, so I knew what I was getting when I bought it. This line of luggage is perfect for people who travel a few times a year and need a case that they can cram full of vacation gear and still manage to get it all back home in one piece.The hard sided exterior does well against the beating it takes on its journey through the airport. It seems thin when you get it, but once it is filled with clothing you will see that it is much sturdier than it appears. The zippers are strong and don't stick easily even under pressure of a full case. The wheels operate smoothly on a variety of surfaces from the airport parking lot pavement to the metal grates of the people movers to the carpet in the check in lobby. The handle is easily adjustable to your desired height and usage, and works well when rolling it upright through the terminal. So why did I mention it is best for people who travel a few times a year as opposed to all travelers?While the hard case is sturdy, I believe that heavy usage will eventually cause it to crack. It isn't as sturdy as more expensive luggage is. The zippers while great are known to have quality control issues, so while mine have been fine, you may end up with one that has a wandering stitch that can lead to a loose zipper tread. The handles also are not as sturdy as more expensive brands. And while the wheels are durable, the wheel wells drag and wear down when pulling them diagonally as opposed to rolling them upright.All this being said, for most people this line of luggage will work perfectly fine. For my uses they are perfect. I also really enjoy the variety of color options. As long as you aren't someone who is constantly catching planes for business trips and the like, you probably won't have to worry about the issues above. And at this price, I think the possible shortfalls are worth the risk.So from my standpoint, this is a great suitcase for vacation and light travel. Just think about the volume of travel you do when purchasing it to make sure you are getting the right product for your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Reasonable
reviews.reviewText: Love this suitcase- got it for a 2 week Scotland trip. I haven’t used it yet but quality seems good, great large capacity and I LOVE the pink color. Great price. Suitcases get trashed by airlines so I can’t see spending an ungodly amount of money on one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality and details
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a hard side spinner bag we purchased on Amazon. I thought that one was nice, however the inside divider was ripped and a wheel was broken. I did not realize how poorly made that was. This bag feels more sturdy and better finishes. It rolls smoothly. It zips smoothly. The dividers don’t feel paper thin. There are nice details on the exterior as well. Bought this as a “used-packaged new” and I don’t believe it was used (perhaps returned?). Great price for a great bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have the carry-on version and have used it for about 2 years. It works well and the size is good. The outer shell is plasticky and does flex a little under pressure, but so far it has held up with no damage. Similarly - the handlebar feels a little flimsy, but it hasn't broken yet. The interior lining fabric that zips up the top storage area is very flimsy and tears easily. Mine tore after just one trip with this bag, but fortunately that doesn't impact the bag's functionality in any major way. Overall it rolls well and generally works fine as a carry-on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this dandy little carry-on: here's what it actually holds as well as its real pro's n con's after 8 trips...
reviews.reviewText: Okay, first of all, I'm a middle-aged lady who travels alone, mostly on flights to see my grandkids and sometimes for academic conventions or the like. I purchased the case about a year ago and had suspicions about "Kenneth Cole" and "suitcase" in the same sentence. I mean, I think of suitcases, and I think Samsonite or names like that--not Kenneth Cole! I guess you could say, I was suspicious about how well this item could actually perform in real life! The review you are about to read was inspired by my most recent trip (July 2015) from Northern California to Portland and back via plane, taxi, light transit, and car. I actually made a note of these items as I unpacked my suitcase:5 tank tops2 t-shirts2 lightweight knit cardigans3 pair yoga pants2 bras and 4 under wear1 pair shortsBathing suitSheath dress2 pair socksSneakersFlannel jammie pantsCrop jeansKnit skirtMakeup/toiletries bag (trifold but stuffed full!)Barrel brush, mini hair dryer, curling iron2 magazines, 2 bags of candy,and 2 stuffed toysTHE PRO'S*Lightweight, even when packed full*Fits easily in overhead bin (it is the newest "officially acceptable" size for the airlines)*Wheelies spin easily & are not cumbersome in airport/plane aisles (I travel mostly in commuter planes with skinny aisles & teensy o/h bins)*Easy to put in out of trunk of car or take on Portland light rail*Small enough to store in the back corner of my closet until next timeTHE CON'S*The handle, when fully extended, feels quite wobbly and rickety (in fact, I predict this is the first thing that will eventually fail)*The zipper doesn't seem very high quality--but so far so good--again, I'm surprised it has not failed yet)*While I have taken it on 8 flights (all using carry-on), I'm not sure how well this case would hold up if regularly checked through and tossed into baggage carousels by careless/busy/over-worked baggage handlers*No external pockets --it's a solid body all the way around. So if u are used to stuffing magazines or boarding passes or the like into pockets, you'll miss them!OVERALLI've been really pleased with this little case. It holds about a week's variety of clothing and supplies and has been a joy to use! I'm quite fond of my little traveling partner. If you get this bag at a good sales price and take moderately good care of it, you should be satisfied with your purchase--I know I am!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our daughter, who travels to England several times a year. She’s 20 and absolutely loves this suitcase. The sides are hard, but still flexible. It has smooth, 360° wheels. The handle raises and lowers smoothly. The inside was made thoughtfully. All around great product and beautiful color. Very sleek and subtle.
Very spacious, beautiful colour rolls like a charm
The top handle broke , used it only twice and it hasn't been even a year. Not good quality
This luggage carry on is solid, light weight, Strong. Easy to carry with wheels. Perfectly fit in aircraft cabin.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hasta el momento todo parece genial, se ven bonitas. En 3 semanas las peobare
reviews.reviewText: Hasta ahora de ven bonitas, llegaron tres dias despues de loPeometido, falta probarlas en viaje. En tres semanas sabre que tan resistentes son, bueno es un viaje sencillo.

Traveled with them twice already and are perfect! Also shout out to the customer service department of this company they were quick to answer and got everything sorted out on the spot! Highly recommend!
